column3: Latest;Pursat province:------ A farmer on a tractor plow and hit buried explosives
column4: causing serious injury. ------The incident happened on March 21
column6: at Ota Kat in the village of Khmeng Krom
column8: Veal Veng district.------ According to the source
column9: the injured man is 44-year-old Pich Him
column10: living in the village. ------Before the incident
column11: the victim was plowing a field when he struck buried ordnance left over from the war. It is not yet known what type of munition was involved.------After the incident
column12: relatives sent the victims to Pursat Provincial Referral Hospital.------ ------https://kbn.news/archives/119519
